title: Chandrika Jhumkas: Adorned with Kempu and Emeralds
materials: South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant sheen.
features: Intricate floral motif design embellished with brilliant polki diamonds and a vibrant Kempu Ruby at the apex. At the center, a stunning emerald is gracefully set, surrounded by more polki diamonds. Delicate South Sea pearl droplets add a touch of classic elegance to the Jhumka.
colors: Luminous Cream/Gold (South Sea Pearls). A rich
occasions: and formal gatherings. Also suitable for elegant evening events where a touch of heritage is desired.
description: A mesmerizing fusion of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The use of high-quality Kempu, Emeralds and Polki diamonds showcases timeless luxury. This Chandbali style Jhumka not only enhances your beauty but also reflects a rich cultural heritage, passed down through generations of skilled artisans.
